formulas.name: faultMessageFormula
formulas.expression: MID( {!$Flow.FaultMessage}, FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} )+34, ( LEN({!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - (FIND('FIELD_CUSTOM_VALIDATION_EXCEPTION: ', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} )+34) ) - ( LEN({!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) - FIND('. You can look up ExceptionCode', {!$Flow.FaultMessage} ) ) )

fields.fieldText: Amortization – Front Load Percentage: {!Get_SOCOMM_Details.rstk__socomm_amortfrontpct__c}

validationRule.errorMessage: Amortization – Front Load Percentage is required and must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 100.

Amortization – Front Load Amount must be a non-negative number.

fields.fieldText: Group default values cannot be modified.

fields.name: orderQtyGrpDfltModify
fields.fieldText: Group Default Values cannot be modified.

validationRule.errorMessage: Invalid value for Default Order Qty, must be a non-negative number.
The Order Qty Decimal Precision must be an Integer value.

fields.name: cantModifyMinQtyOrdError
fields.fieldText: Minimum Qty Ordered cannot be modified when 'Enforce Minimum Qty Ordered' is set FALSE

validationRule.errorMessage: Invalid value for Minimum Order Qty, must be a non-negative number.

fields.name: orderQtyLotError
fields.fieldText: Order Qty Lot Size cannot be modified when 'Enforce Ordering in Lot Size' is set FALSE

validationRule.errorMessage: Invalid value for Order Qty Lot Size, must be a non-negative number.

fields.fieldText: Alternate Price 1: {!Get_Current_SOPROD_Record.rstk__soprod_altprice1__c}

fields.name: cantModifyRMAFieldsError
fields.fieldText: Below fields cannot be Group Defaulted when RMA Inventory Site is Overridden.

fields.name: ovrInsLocNumError
fields.fieldText: RMA Inspection Location Number should be Overridden when RMA Inspection Location is set as Override.

fields.name: rmaInspLocNotOverrideError
fields.fieldText: RMA Inspection Location Number can be overridden only when RMA Inspection Location is set as Override.

fields.name: rmaInvLocNotOverrideError
fields.fieldText: RMA Inventory Location Number can be overridden only when RMA Inventory Location is set as override.

fields.name: ovrInvLocNumError
fields.fieldText: RMA Inventory Location Number should be Overridden when RMA Inventory Location is set as Override.

fields.name: ovrScrapLocNumError
fields.fieldText: RMA Scrap Location Number should be Overridden when RMA Scrap Location Number is set as Override.

fields.name: rmaScrapLocNotOverrideError
fields.fieldText: RMA Scrap Location Number can be overridden only when RMA Scrap Location is set as Override.

fields.fieldText: RMA Inspection Order Template can be modified only for Stock/Configured Products.
